commit message: Prepare wear project structure
Moved the 'app' folder to 'handheld'
Moved assets to the common module
Moved classes from ca.rmen.nounours to ca.rmen.nounours.android.handheld
Moved the common ca.rmen.nounours.settings package to ca.rmen.nounours.android.common.settings
Moved some classes from the handheld to the common module
Moved ThemeUtil to the common module

Moved some classes to the common module:

AnimationHandler, FlingDetector, TouchListener
Moved AndroidNounours to the common module
Add first version of watchface
Use Calendar instead of Time. Remove the timezone broadcast listener
Adding icons for nounours watchface
Added bugdroid watchface
Added the other nounours themes
Fixing some copyright headers

Removed the duplicat setting for the background color.

Fixed some copyright headers
Update gradle build scripts for wear vs foss flavors
Package the wear apk inside the handheld apk, for the fullWear flavor.
Moved some onTouchListener classes to the handheld module
Translated watchface names into French.
Added flavors to the wear module
enable minify on the wear module

Separate nounours resources for wear vs handheld.

Also, only use the college and bugdroid themes on the watch
Resize wearable images

Add wear permissions to the handheld apk, except for the foss flavor.

Also removed the foss vs wear variants of the nounours and bugdroid flavors:
the nounours and bugdroid apps will only exist with wear enabled.
Added an ambient image
Moved watchface rendering logic into a new class NounoursWatchFaceRenderer
Android studio code inspection
Improving naming in the watch face classes
Choose a different bugdroid image for ambient mode
Removed all code for rendering time.  Let the system do that, for now.
Fix aspect ratio of ambient mode image
Use the default status bar gravity
Compressed ambient images with ```pngquant --speed 1  --posterize=3 *.png```
Added missing copyright headers
Reuse NounoursRenderer code inside NounoursWatchFaceRenderer

Put all cache classes in the common module.

Made NounoursResourceCache a class instead of an interface, and removed the implementing classes.
Added Javadoc to NounoursWatchFace and removed unused code.
Removed watchface logic to refresh every second when in normal mode.
Fix nounours animations in ambient mode
Redid the preview screenshots
enable shrinkResources in handheld release
Specify a different wear app application label, for each wear app.
Merge branch 'wear2'
